<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/openai/v1/vector_stores/{vector_store_id}/file_batches/{batch_id}/cancel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Cancels a vector store file batch.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
